statements: DELETE FROM in_game_transactions WHERE player_id = 'a1b2c3d4-a1b2-c3d4-a1b2-c3d4a1b2c3d4' AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND transaction_amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM virtual_currency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND transaction_amount < 50;
DELETE FROM in_game_purchases WHERE player_id = 123 AND purchase_amount > 50.00;
DELETE FROM virtual_currency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM purchases_history WHERE player_id = 101 AND item_id = 201;
DELETE FROM transactions_log WHERE player_id = 202 AND coins_amount = 500;
DELETE FROM purchases_history WHERE player_id = 2002 AND item_id = 5003;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 10 AND transaction_type = 'refund';
